content: आसन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Drawn near, approached, near (in time, place or number); आसन्नविंशाः nearly or about 20; at hand, close by, impending, imminent; आसन्नपतने कूले <ls>Ś. B.</ls>; °मरण, °काल <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--2@} Adjacent, adjoining. {@--3@} Well-placed. {@--4@} About to die. --न्नः The setting sun.
